application.title: Application Period
application.application_option_1: Regular application period for full-time studies:
application.application_option_1_sub_1: 15 April - 15 July for entry in October
application.application_option_1_sub_2: 15 November - 15 January for entry in March
application.application_option_2: Exceptions to the regular application period:
application.application_option_2_sub_1: Master Applied Research in Engineering Sciences: apply 15 April - 31 May for October entry or 15 Nov - 15 Dec for March entry
application.application_option_2_sub_2: Master Global Public Health: apply 15 April - 15 June for October entry
application.application_option_3: General application deadlines for part-time studies:
application.application_option_3_sub_1: October entries: Applications accepted until July 15
application.application_option_3_sub_2: March entries: Applications accepted until January 15
application.requirement_sub_title: Apply directly to DIT online application platform (Primuss) and follow the steps indicated. Required documents for application:
application.requirement_2: Final bachelor certificate and transcripts of records

image_container.body: at Bavaria's most international University of Applied Sciences

intro.title: Why Study at DIT?
intro.body: Let our Pioneering and Vibrant University Inspire You

international.reasons_title: More Reasons to Choose DIT as YOUR University

reasons.first_reason_content: We're the only university of applied sciences with a campus teaching exclusively in English; the European Campus Rottal-Inn
reasons.second_reason_content: Enjoy the European flair at our two teaching campuses set in charming urban locations
reasons.third_reason_content: See what's happening on campus: From our own TV show to International Week and the Campus Open Air Festival
reasons.fourth_reason_content: Feel at home in attractive, affordable & modern self-contained student apartments
reasons.fifth_reason_content: Our student population is currently over 8,000 including 34% international students from all over the globe
reasons.sixth_reason_content: Whether you are looking for accommodation, a job, or organizing a study semester abroad: we're always here to help you
reasons.seventh_reason_content: We have been recognized with international awards: in numerous rankings, we are at the top
reasons.eighth_reason_content: Enjoy competitive or recreational sports in a wide range of sport clubs from rowing or yoga to volleyball or football
reasons.ninth_reason_content: 87% of all DIT graduates find a job within 2 months, and we provide support for student start-ups. Get a head start on your career!

validators.min_length: The length should be a minimum of 6 characters.
validators.max_length_20: The length should be a maximum of 20 characters.
